templateSampleData.name: Template Name
templateSampleData.passwordEnabled: Boolean if password should be used during authentication.
templateSampleData.filename: Outbound: File name to send as. Inbound: File name to save to our server.
templateSampleData.serverFilename: Inbound Only: Filename to look for on external server.
templateSampleData.sshEnabled: Boolean if ssh key should be used during authentication.
templateSampleData.pgpEncrypted: Boolean if file should be pgp encrypted
templateSampleData.pgpExtension: File extension to use for pgp encrypted file (example '.pgp')
templateSampleData.pgpSign: Boolean if file should be signed with pgp key
templateSampleData.sshKexAlgorithm: Key exchange algorithm to use (For old sftp servers)
templateSampleData.sshHostkeyAlgorithm: SSH host key algorithm to use (For old sftp servers)
